702002f-a.text:
A panoramic view northeastward across the car yards of the Interborough Rapid Transit Co., the elevated structure of the I.R.T. Van Cortlandt Park subway and its 242nd Street station, on Broadway; and Van Cortlandt Park, as seen from the N.E. corner of Waldo Ave. and
West 238th Street.
May 1926.
Brown Brothers.
